pr_title: [BEAM-10994] Adds ability to log literal hot key in Batch Dataflow

timeline.message: Implement the BatchDataflowWorker hot key logging

timeline.bodyText: See my earlier comment on #12984 about assuming that key == null is the same thing as not present.
timeline.author: lukecwik

replies.bodyText: In the BatchModeExecutionContext the getKey method's comment states "If there is not a currently defined key, returns null." Is this an error? Do you want me to update the comment?
replies.author: rohdesamuel

timeline.message: Implement the BatchDataflowWorker hot key logging
Change key logging to allow for null keys
Change key logging to allow for null keys
